summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 34th Avenue West, from West Ray Street to Government Way; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by grading and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 10819 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
